title: Squarespace SEO & Landing Page Specialist (Project-Based + Ongoing SEO)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Squarespace expert to start with a one-time paid project focused on creating and optimizing a landing page. If successful, this could lead to ongoing monthly SEO support.

Project Scope:
Create and design a high-converting landing page on Squarespace
Optimize the page for SEO (on-page elements, speed, responsiveness)
Incorporate basic graphic improvements if needed

Ideal Candidate:
-Strong experience with Squarespace design and customization
-Proven SEO skills (on-page, off-page, and technical)
-Can design with conversion and UX in mind
-Great communication and able to work independently
-Able to show examples of past SEO success and design work on Squarespace

We’re not looking for a full-time or monthly hire upfront. This will begin as a project-based engagement with a fixed rate for the landing page, followed by an optional ongoing SEO retainer.

If you’re confident in delivering results and have experience with similar projects, we’d love to hear from you. Please include:
-Examples of Squarespace landing pages you’ve created
-A brief note on your SEO experience
-Any relevant case studies or metrics you've achieved

How to Apply:
Send link of resume and your vacaroo Upgrade to see actual info/ introducing yourself and why we should hire you
